name: MEC Drencher Gloves - Unisex
description: Pedal anywhere, anytime. These waterproof "lobster" gloves keep your fingers together for warmth, but give you enough dexterity to brake easily. Depending on the temperature, pull on the Drencher Gloves over thin liners or warmer fleece gloves to enjoy dry, toasty digits.Waterproof, breathable nylon fabric with taped seams keeps water out.Lobster-style gloves keep your fingers warm while providing enough dexterity for braking or changing gears.Shingle-action cuff slides under your jacket to stop water from running in.Brushed fleece sniffle patch on thumb.3M reflective trim for low-light visibility.
